column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: nye onyia biara a ɔdze fun egu noho fi

column2: "ɔbanyin o ɔbaa o hom ntu no. Nseraban no ekyir na hom ntu hɔn nkogu amma woeenngu hɔn nseraban a metse ne finimfin no ho fi."
"Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dɛmara
column3: na wotuu hɔn koguu nseraban ekyir: na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses no

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: Sɛ ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa yɛ bɔn tsia nyimpa bi
column7: na ɔkra no dzi so a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔmpaa mu nka hɔn bɔn a wɔayɛ no: na ontua n'asodzidze no imu
column3: na ɔmfa no mu ebupɛn enum mu kor nto do
column4: na ɔmfa mma nyia ɔafom no edzi so no."

column2: "Mbom sɛ nyimpa no ewu na onnyi bɔgya bi a ɔbɛn no a wɔdze asodzidze bɛma no wɔ asodzi no ntsi a
column3: asodzi no ho asodzidze no yɛ EWURADZE dze na ɔnyɛ ɔsɔfo no dze; nka mpata oguannyin no a wɔdze rebɛpata ama no no ho."

column2: "Na ɔtow afɔr biara a ɔwɔ Israelmba adzekrɔnkrɔn nyinara mu a wɔdze brɛ ɔsɔfo no
column3: nyɛ nedze."

column2: "Na nyimpa biara n'adzekrɔnkrɔn a ɔdze ba no yɛ ɔsɔfo no dze: biribiara a nyimpa biara dze ma ɔsɔfo no
column3: nedze ara na ɔnyɛ."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ ɔbanyin bi ne yer fi ne nkyɛn
column9: "na ɔbanyin bi nye no da dze no ho nsu ma no
column13: na no ho ɔdasefo bi nnyi hɔ
column14: nkyii so wɔannkyer no wɔ do;"

column2: "na nyinkun sunsum ba no do
column3: na ɔtwe ne yer no ho nyinkun
column4: na sɛ basia no egu noho fi ampa: anaa sɛ nyinkun sunsum ba no do
column5: na ɔtwe ne yer no ho nyinkun
column6: na sɛ basia no nguu noho fi a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔbanyin no mfa ne yer no mbrɛ ɔsɔfo no
column3: na ɔmfa no ho ayɛyɛdze mbra
column4: atoko isiam efa ebupɛn du mu kor; mma ɔmmfa ngo nngu do
column5: na ɔmmfa krɔbɔw so nnto do; osiandɛ ɔyɛ nyinkun ho edziban afɔr na nkaa ho edziban afɔr

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa no mbɛn
column3: na ɔmfa no mbegyina EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa nsu krɔnkrɔn ngu dɛtse kɔɔpow bi mu; na ɔsɔfo no mfa ntamadan no ne daadze huntuma no bi
column3: ngu nsu no mu:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa ɔbaa no ngyina EWURADZE enyim
column3: na ontutu ɔbaa no ne tsinhwi ngu do
column4: na ɔmfa nkaa edziban afɔr no a ɔyɛ nyinkun edziban afɔr no nhyɛ ne nsamu: na ɔsɔfo no nkitsa nsu wenwen a ɔdze ndom ba no wɔ ne nsamu."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mma ondzi nsew
column3: na ɔnse ɔbaa no dɛ
column4: Sɛ banyin bi nnye wo nndae
column5: na sɛ immfii wo kun nkyɛn nnkoguu woho fi a
column6: wo ho nyɛ tɔtrɔtɔ wɔ nsu wenwen a ɔdze ndom ba yi ho:"

column2: "mbom sɛ efi wo kun nkyɛn
column3: ber a ewar wo kun yi na sɛ ekogu woho fi
column4: na banyin bi nye wo ada ka wo kun ho a:"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no mma ɔbaa no mfa ndom ntam ndzi nsew
column3: na ɔsɔfo no nse ɔbaa no dɛ
column4: EWURADZE nyɛ wo dzin ndom nye ntam wɔ wo man mu
column5: aber a EWURADZE bɛma w'aserɛ atotɔ mu

column2: "Na nsu a ɔdze ndom ba yi akɛhɛn wo nson mu
column3: na ɔama wo yafun ahon
column4: na w'aserɛ atotɔ mu: na ɔbaa no nse dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no nkyerɛw ndom yi wɔ nwoma mu
column3: na ɔmpepa ngu nsu wenwen no mu:"

column2: "na ɔmma ɔbaa no nnom nsu wenwen a ɔdze ndom ba no: na nsu a ɔdze ndom ba no nkɔ no mu nkɛyɛ wenwen."
"Na ɔsɔfo no ngye nyinkun ho edziban afɔr no wɔ ɔbaa no nsamu
column3: na ɔntow edziban afɔr no wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: na ɔmfa mbra afɔrmbukyia no ho;"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa edziban afɔr no mu nsapuw
column3: dɛ ne nkaadze
column4: na ɔnhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column5: na n'ekyir no ɔmma ɔbaa no nnom nsu no."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ aber a ɔama ɔanom nsu no
column3: sɛ oegu noho fi na ɔayɛ bɔn etsia no kun a
column4: nsu no a ɔdze ndom ba no bɛhɛn no mu akɛyɛ wenwen
column6: na n'aserɛ atotɔ mu: na ɔbaa no ayɛ ndom wɔ ne man mu."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbaa no ho enngu fi
column3: na no ho tsew dze a; ɔno no ho bɛyɛ tɔtrɔtɔ

column2: "Iyi nye nyinkun ho mbra
column3: sɛ ɔyer bi fi no kun nkyɛn na okogu noho fi;"

column2: "anaa sɛ nyinkun sunsum ba banyin bi do
column3: na ɔtwe ne yer ho nyinkun a; ɔno ɔmfa ɔbaa no mbegyina EWURADZE enyim
column4: na ɔsɔfo no nyɛ no mbra yi mu adze nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔbanyin no ho bɛyɛ tɔtrɔtɔ wɔ emumuyɛ ho
column3: na ɔbaa no asoa n'emumuyɛ."
